idea: Fintheon is a very advanced virtual credit manager that uses consent based data to analyze business velocity and give precision insights. Lenders like Banks and NBFCs use Fintheon for quality credit assessment when loan onboarding as well as portfolio credit monitoring at massive scale . We are fully digitized with digital footprint captured towards secure data access . Our scalable architecture can run our proprietary models simultaneously on millions of borrowers  and give insights on each of them .
name: Fintheon - Precision Virtual Credit Manager

idea:
BlueEarth is a venture focused on realizing the goals set forth by the global community to reach carbon neutrality, net zero emissions, and other climate positive outcomes.

Our initiatives include projects focusing on, community based projects, sustainable agriculture, afforestation, solar and wind energy production, and providing strategic sustainability solutions to industrial players.

We are in the realm of “climate change, Carbon offsets, and sustainability solutions” It’s objective is to be rehabilitation Earth to low carbon and a climate-resilient global economy through various carbon offsets mechanism like CDM,VCS, GOLD Standard (GS), GCC, IREC, etc., and nature based solution on the long run. Through these projects, we will help our clients reduce and offset their emissions to achieve their sustainability goals.

BlueEarth intends to be a one stop solution from issuance till sale of carbon credits. We intend to disrupt the unorganized market of carbon credits through a block chain based platform bringing in transparency and reducing volatility in prices to ensure it works in the best interest of market participants.
name: BLUEEARTH ENVIRONMENT PRIVATE LIMITED
